channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins S3 publisher Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins S3 publisher Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2114|2024-08-04T07:01:40.926Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20s3%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins S3 publisher Plugin 0.11.4 and earlier transmits configured credentials in plain text as part of the global Jenkins configuration form, potentially resulting in their exposure.
